snippet: Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony was ejected late in the second quarter Wednesday night against Atlanta after getting whistled for a flagrant foul 2....
lead_paragraph: Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony was ejected late in the second quarter Wednesday night against Atlanta after getting whistled for a flagrant foul 2.

headline.main: Anthony Ejected in Atlanta for Flagrant Foul 2
headline.print_headline: Anthony Ejected in Atlanta for Flagrant Foul 2
